alert.note: Alert for Northumberland; Richmond; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 5:21PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Northumberland, northern Richmond and Westmoreland Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Montross, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Montross, Callao, Kinsale, Newland, Hague, Haynesville, Westmoreland, Currioman Landing, Threeway, Mount Holly, Stratford Hall, Lyells, Erica, Piney Grove, Templeman, Lerty, Ethel, Village, Singerly and Foneswood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
